title: List Foreign Property Income & Expenses Period Summaries
description: This endpoint allows the developer to list the submission periods associated with their foreign property business. A National Insurance number and business ID are required.

items.description: An array containing the submission periods associated with a property business.

submissionId.description: The unique identifier of the periodic submission.

fromDate.description: The first day that the income and expenses period summary covers. Must conform to the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

toDate.description: The first day that the income and expenses period summary covers. Must conform to the format: YYYY-MM-DD.
